faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheadline: Clarity around how sports psychology fits your training schedule.
faq.q1.question: What happens during the first session?
faq.q1.answer: We map out your current routines, stress points, and goals. Together we build a focused plan with clear metrics for confidence, recovery, and competitive readiness.
faq.q2.question: Do you work with individuals or teams?
faq.q2.answer: Both. I coach professional athletes, youth prospects, coaches, and entire staffs—sessions are customized to the culture and season you are navigating.
faq.q3.question: How soon will I notice results?
faq.q3.answer: Most athletes feel a shift within 2–3 sessions as we implement pre-performance routines and reflection tools. Sustainable change comes from consistent practice, which we track together.
faq.q4.question: Is everything confidential?
faq.q4.answer: Yes. Sessions follow professional standards with secure notes, and I only collaborate with coaches or parents when you approve it.

testimonials.sarah.name: Alon
testimonials.sarah.quote:
Dear Noa!
I don't have enough words to thank you....
You listened, believed, supported and most importantly were always there for me❤️❤️
We appreciate and value you. Huge thanks❤️❤️❤️
testimonials.david.name: Omri S.
testimonials.david.quote: Working with Noa turned rehab from frustration into purpose. I returned to the pitch believing in my body and decision-making again.
testimonials.rachel.name: Coach Liat
testimonials.rachel.quote: Her workshops gave our staff concrete language for accountability without fear. The locker room feels connected, and it shows on court.
